text: Heliri; ‘‘visva samrajyada odeyanada allahane, ninu ninicchisidavarige adhikaravannu niduve mattu ninicchisidavarinda adhikaravannu kittukolluve. Hageye ninicchisidavarige ninu gauravavannu dayapalisuve mattu ninicchisidavarannu apamanitaragisuve. Olitellavu ninna kaiyalle ide. Khanditavagiyu ninu ellavannu madalu saktanu’’
